doc:
Al Matthews (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_Matthews_(actor) 0 Alexander Basil Matthews (November 21, 1942 – September 22, 2018) was an American actor and singer, best known for his appearance as Gunnery Sergeant Apone in the James Cameron film Aliens (1986). He reprised his role 27 years later, providing the voice of Apone for the video game Aliens: Colonial Marines (2013). Matthews' portrayal of Apone was the inspiration for Sgt. Avery Johnson of the Halo franchise. Alexander_Basil_Matthews ( November_21_,_1942 – September_22_,_2018 ) was an_American_actor_and_singer , best_known for his_appearance as Gunnery_Sergeant_Apone in the_James_Cameron_film_Aliens ( 1986 ) . He reprised his_role 27_years later , providing the_voice of Apone for the_video_game_Aliens : Colonial_Marines_(_2013_) . Matthews '_portrayal of Apone was the_inspiration for Sgt._Avery_Johnson of the_Halo_franchise .
